name: Spring Time Sunflower
description:
Controls: A+D or arrows to move. Z to harvest and get a new plant

Gameplay: 

Collect water to gain score.  Avoid salt or you will damage your plant.

Press Z when your plant is ready to harvest to swap to a new plant and increase your score multiplier! Don't worry the game will tell you when you should do this

This is my first game jam and as such I have made a simple arcade game but focused on learning some of my weaker points such as art and sound. Everything in this game was created by me during the jam (which is probably why it looks weird) but I had a lot of fun! I hope you enjoy
